lines.name: Cat
lines.line: Meowww (like it is trying to explain something)

lines.name: Cat
lines.line: Meowww? *surprised*

lines.name: Cat
lines.line: Purr purr

lines.name: Cat
lines.line: As I tried to explain, it is forbidden and dangerous to enter this pyramid. And, congratulations! You annoyed Anubis, what a mess!

lines.name: Cat
lines.line: Alright, I will help you a bit.

lines.name: Cat
lines.line: First of all, you have not been teleported to another place, just to another time.

lines.name: Cat
lines.line: You are in the same pyramid you so much wanted to visit and plunder, relax.

lines.name: Cat
lines.line: Now you can see how it was at the beginning. When it was just finished.

lines.name: Cat
lines.line: I know it is beeeaaauuuuuutiful isn't it?

lines.name: Cat
lines.line: Oh! But maybe you just want to go to your time, and as I am the kindest goddess here (yes I am aware I am the only one) I will help you.

lines.name: Cat
lines.line: Returning to your time is not an easy task, I do not have the power to make you return to the 21st century.

lines.name: Cat
lines.line: And even if I was able to, I do not want to. You came here to explore, you will explore, be happy!

lines.name: Cat
lines.line: You need 3 artefacts to go home : mine, Sobek's and Ra's.

lines.name: Cat
lines.line: Oh, by the way, I am Bastet. Sometimes I forget that some humans do not know my name.

lines.name: Bastet
lines.line: If you want my artefact, you will have to complete this trial.

lines.name: Bastet
lines.line: But I'm sure it will be impossible for such a reckless adventurer as you.

lines.name: Steve
lines.line: Oh come on, I'm not just a regular human, I am the all mighty Stev...

lines.name: Bastet
lines.line: Enough !

lines.name: Bastet
lines.line: If you really want to go back to your era, I will give you a little help.

lines.name: Bastet
lines.line: Thanks to my divine greatness, you are now able to move those lovely blocks.

lines.name: Bastet
lines.line: Use this power wisely and you will be able to complete your quest. (Button Fire 2)
